participant_1.background:
My ideal home would have a yard big enough for my dog and cat to run around in.
i used to cheerlead in high school.
i am traveling to barbados next month.
I remember the good times I had as a kid and remind myself that I can still have fun now.
I would love to have lunch with my geocaching friends and share our adventures.

participant_2.background:
My most difficult decision was whether to follow my dreams or to stay in a stable job.
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
this past summer i hiked the appalachian trail.
I'm doing well in school, thanks for asking!
I lost everything when the economy crashed.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Hi, I'm doing well! I just finished hiking the Appalachian trail, and I'm excited to share all of my stories with my friends.
That is awesome! I'm glad to hear that you had a great time. I've never been hiking before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely try it! It's a great way to get outdoors and see some amazing sights.
I'll definitely keep that in mind. What was your favorite part of the hike?
My favorite part was the feeling of accomplishment when I reached the top of Mount Katahdin. It was a long and challenging hike, but it was worth it.
That's awesome! I'm sure it was a great feeling.
It was! I'm already planning my next hike.
What are you thinking of hiking next?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about doing the Pacific Crest Trail.
The Pacific Crest Trail is a great choice! It's one of the most challenging hikes in the world, but it's also one of the most rewarding.
Thanks! I'm excited to start planning it.
